entry.title: Downloading blockchain
entry.summary: The author of the message expresses a desire to download the entire blockchain by hand using software, and asks for help finding such software. They mention that the closest thing they have found is "Bitcoin-protocol-test-harness" code, but it is two years old and doesn't seem to work with the current bitcoin network. The author also expresses a preference for Python-based software. The message includes the author's contact information, as well as a PGP signature.
